title: what if my flex rank is better than solo rank .Will i get flex rank brother
body: what if my flex rank is better than solo rank .Will i get flex rank brother

replies.body: As far as borders go, you should end up with the border from your higher rank!

Flex rank brother? Do you mean border? Yes, you should. When they announced the two different ranked at the beginning of the season, they said rewards would be given out for both queues. So you will get the better border at the end of the season.
